full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement

#### Financial Audit Generalist

The Jacques Cartier and Champlain Bridges Incorporated (JCCBI)

---

**Procurement Identification Number:** CB-4374-4339151
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 388
**Publication Date:** March 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** April 6, 2023 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** April 6, 2023

#### Interested Parties

This request for proposal (RFP) is open to Audit and Related Services Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders who are qualified under Stream 1 – Financial Audit of the SA369 series.

#### Description of the Work

The Office of the Auditor General of Canada is conducting an annual financial audit of The Jacques Cartier and Champlain Bridges Incorporated (JCCBI). The Office requires the professional services of two (2) Senior Auditors to assist the audit team in conducting the financial audit in accordance with Generally Accepted Auditing Standards (GAAS) and the Office's audit and documentation standards.

#### Proposal Requirements

The successful bidder will be selected through a competitive process based on the criteria outlined in this RFP. The award of the contract will be made in June 2023. 

#### Security Clearance

Bidders must have an active Reliability clearance.

---

#### Make an Offer

To respond to this RFP, you must have a valid Bidder's Package, which can be obtained by contacting the following individual:

Beth Cooper
Suppliers Contact
Office of the Auditor General of Canada
240 Sparks Street
Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1A 0G6
supplier@oag-bvg.gc.ca
(613) 952-0213

__The original request for proposal (RFP) number 388 was for a contract duration ending on June 16, 2023. The request details were as follows:__
 
* The Office of the Auditor General of Canada is conducting an annual financial audit of The Jacques Cartier and Champlain Bridges Incorporated.
* Two (2) Senior Auditors are needed to assist the OAG audit team in conducting the audit.
* The OAG requires the professional services of these senior auditors in accordance with Generally Accepted Auditing Standards (GAAS) and the Office's documentation standards.
* Security Requirements: Reliability clearance.
* Tender closing date: April 6, 2023.
